name: Desert Special Forces
description:
Captain, you have a new mission!
Desert Special Forces is about liberating enemy camps from terrorists planning attacks. The main hero is a secret agent who lands on one of these camps and aims to kill the terrorists guarding it. As a true professional, you have to succeed in record time in order not to be noticed. Once you've left, there's no going back, because we don't want people to hear about our operations. Either you're a hero, or we erase your tracks. That's why we chose you captain, so we don't make a mistake!
Game features :
  • Killing the enemies at the military base
  • 10 levels
  • First-person shooter
